classmeta.shortdesc: Displays a GdkPixbuf in a cell of a GtkTreeView.

desc.para: Creates a new GtkCellRendererPixbuf. Rendering parameters are adjusted using the object properties. The object properties can be set globally with (set_property). Also, with GtkTreeViewColumn, you can bind the "pixbuf" property on the cell renderer to a value in a GtkTreeModel, thus rendering a different image in each row of the GtkTreeView.
